COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: Without any fanfare, the new year had already begun
when I awoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: I had no errands to run, so I was about to go back to
sleep when I saw Phorni standing on the other side of
my pillow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c
STRING: [Phorni] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: [Phorni] “And what day is it today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa
STRING: [Chris] “New Year's. Good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224
STRING: [Phorni] “That's right. Today's the start of... Hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm still sleepy...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: I peeked at the clock before my eyes closed and found
it wasn't even noon yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: I could've gotten up, but I didn't have a reason not to
go back to sleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: [Phorni] “You'll be sorry...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290
STRING: [Chris] “Oh. I'm so scared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae
STRING: [Phorni] “A-Anyway, at least keep your eyes open!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4
STRING: [Chris] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e2
STRING: [Phorni] “Weren't you taught to look at a person when
they're speaking to you?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: Technically, Phorni wasn't a “person,” but it would have
been unfair to tease her like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, you're absolutely right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358
STRING: [Phorni] “Good boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e
STRING: [Chris] “But, I don't need to go out today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Not at all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “There were probably plenty of people being
rowdy yesterday, and I guess there'll still be some today
as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: [Phorni] “Do you need to do any shopping?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: [Chris] “I did it all last year, remember?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x426
STRING: [Phorni] “So you're totally free?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43c
STRING: [Chris] “I want to spend my day in peace and quiet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46e
STRING: [Phorni] “Then, why don't we sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484
STRING: [Chris] “Listen, you've been singing every day, haven't
you? Let's have today off, at least.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c0
STRING: [Phorni] “That's not what you promised...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d6
STRING: [Chris] “Something to say about a promise from last
year?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: [Phorni] “Gah?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm kidding... But I am really sleepy right now,
so why don't we start in the evening? After I get my
letter from Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Phorni] “But then that's just like every other day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: [Chris] “There's nothing wrong with the usual way. It's
Sunday today. It doesn't matter if it's New Year's or not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: [Phorni] “In the evening, then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: [Phorni] “Definitely?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: [Chris] “Definitely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: [Phorni] “Meanie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x670
STRING: [Phorni] “You're supposed to deny it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x686
STRING: [Chris] “If I denied it, you'd try to use that against me to
make me play the Fortelle, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, so that's one way to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ce
STRING: [Chris] “You hadn't thought of that, huh... Anyway, that's
how it is, so just wait until the evening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70a
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: I guess that's okay then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x744
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Now, good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x776
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmph... Good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: I closed my eyes for a while, but I kept hearing the
sound of Phorni moving her legs restlessly next to my
pillow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ae
STRING: Just as I was about to doze off, Phorni started singing a
beautiful melody.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c4
STRING: It was a song I'd heard before, perhaps.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: It made me feel extremely nostalgic...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: Something I'd heard somewhere...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: But maybe not...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80c
STRING: Somewhere between dreams and reality, I drifted along
the gentle waves, and then I was fast asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x860
STRING: Right after I opened my eyes, I called out to Phorni
thinking she'd be in the same place, and after a while I
finally got a response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, yes, just a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: Phorni glided across the short distance from my desk to
the bed and landed gently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e8
STRING: [Phorni] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fe
STRING: [Chris] “What are you talking about? The morning is
long gone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x930
STRING: [Phorni] “I know that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x946
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha, come on, don't be angry. Let's go get
my letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah! You're just trying to change the subject!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: [Chris] “I certainly am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ca
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmph!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: Putting on a jacket, I went to the entrance of my
apartment building to collect my letter from Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5c
STRING: [Phorni] “What did Arie say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa72
STRING: [Chris] “I won't know until I open it now, will I...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa90
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, come on then, lets open up and see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa6
STRING: [Chris] “And why is it that you're interested again,
today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm not... Really interested, or anything like
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaee
STRING: [Chris] “Good, then be quiet like usual while I write my
reply.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: [Chris] “You know that letters aren't supposed to be
shown to people they're not intended for, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb72
STRING: [Phorni] “I know that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb88
STRING: [Chris] “But I still tell you what they're about, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbba
STRING: [Phorni] “I know that, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd0
STRING: [Chris] “So then why did you want to see?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Phorni] “Cause lots of things have happened recently,
like with Fal. I was just worried, okay? Bleh!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4a
STRING: I could understand why she might be worried, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: There was no need to get angry and vanish like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc62
STRING: I was pretty sure she only disappeared like that when I
was about to go to sleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: Perhaps she really was angry?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc84
STRING: I guess it could be because she's concerned about Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: Or, perhaps it's because she's concerned about me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: [Phorni] “Go on, read it! I'm waiting!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd6
STRING: [Chris] “Gah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: [Phorni] “I've been waiting since morning, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0a
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, yeah. Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd28
STRING: [Phorni] “Good boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: [Chris] “That's really not good for my heart, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: I quickly grabbed my letter knife, and carefully opened
the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: All together, I had received well over 100 letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd76
STRING: In the beginning, we wrote about many things over
numerous pages, so I wasn't sure of the exact number.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8c
STRING: Over time, the number of pages decreased, but our
feelings were still as one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda2
STRING: As if speaking with someone I could only speak to once
a week, our exchange of words continued on naturally.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: It was almost as if we were conversing face to face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: I could sense Arie's presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe10
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it raining there now as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe26
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3a
STRING: I imagine the New Year will have come by the time this
letter reaches you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: Now, there is just two more months.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: And then, your long school life in Piova will be over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: I may have written this before, but it makes me feel a
little scared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8a
STRING: I have no right to tell you what I want from you, or what
I want you to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: I'm simply waiting for your return, Chris, but I am a little
afraid that you will no longer be the Chris that I used to
know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: In your last letter, you wrote to me about Falsita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: I feel proud of you for wanting to help her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: I believe I wrote this in my last letter, but let me write it
once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf18
STRING: Chris, you can do whatever it is you want to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2c
STRING: Please do not worry about what others think, or what I
may think. Do what it is you think you should do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4a
STRING: It is almost time for your graduation recital, so please
stay in good health.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: Please put on a wonderful performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: I'm sure it will help you have a bright future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc6
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, you can do whatever it is you want to
do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: [Chris] “Ph-Phorni!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1016
STRING: [Phorni] “I see... So that's how Arie feels.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102c
STRING: [Chris] “Could you not look without my permission...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105e
STRING: [Phorni] “Come on, it was only a little! Why so serious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I've got a serious look on my face.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: [Phorni] “Why is that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10bc
STRING: [Chris] “That was the second time... That Arie wrote
something like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: Upon hearing this, Phorni made a face, but then
laughed in an almost lonely kind of way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: [Phorni] “People's hearts are complicated, aren't they.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1138
STRING: She spoke in a serious tone, which was very unlike her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1144
STRING: Her words could have been taken as a joke, but her
face and voice would have betrayed such an idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115a
STRING: [Chris] “...It sounds like it means something else when
you say it, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118c
STRING: [Phorni] “I guess it might.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c0
STRING: [Phorni] “And? What are you going to write in reply?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess the only thing I can write for the time
being is... That I understand what she's saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1208
STRING: [Phorni] “What do you want to do, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: [Chris] “At the moment, I want to focus all my energy on
the graduation recital. It's too late for me to just go and
change partners.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125a
STRING: [Phorni] “I see. If that's the case, I don't think there's
anything wrong with that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: Phorni's smile wasn't comforting, in fact, if anything I felt
there was something cold about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a0
STRING: My fingers were almost shaking, but I somehow
overcame that feeling and wrote my reply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: I wrote exactly what I had said to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: I barely added any other words to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c4
STRING: How would Arie feel receiving my response, a letter that
was much shorter than usual?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12da
STRING: Would she still be accepting?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you finished yet? Let's sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1338
STRING: We don't know
how many more chances we will have to do this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134e
STRING: [Chris] “What are you talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Phorni] “The end always comes eventually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: [Phorni] “That's why I want to enjoy our songs, while I
still can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni, what are you going to do after all of
this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? What do you mean, ‘after all of this’?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: [Chris] “...After I leave this place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: [Phorni] “Who knows? Maybe nothing will even change,
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: [Chris] “Will you still be here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148c
STRING: [Phorni] “Maybe I will, maybe I won't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a2
STRING: [Chris] “...That's vague.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b8
STRING: Phorni laughed again, then she spoke in a songlike
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e0
STRING: [Phorni] “When the time comes, you'll see.”
